org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.impl

Class ReplicaMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.impl.ReplicaMap

  •  class ReplicaMap
extends Object
    Maintains the replica map.

      • get

        ReplicaInfo get(String bpid,
              Block block)
        Get the meta information of the replica that matches both block id and generation stamp
        Parameters:
        bpid - block pool id
        block - block with its id as the key
        Returns:
        the replica's meta information
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the input block or block pool is null

      • get

        ReplicaInfo get(String bpid,
              long blockId)
        Get the meta information of the replica that matches the block id
        Parameters:
        bpid - block pool id
        blockId - a block's id
        Returns:
        the replica's meta information

      • add

        ReplicaInfo add(String bpid,
              ReplicaInfo replicaInfo)
        Add a replica's meta information into the map
        Parameters:
        bpid - block pool id
        replicaInfo - a replica's meta information
        Returns:
        previous meta information of the replica
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameter is null

      • addAll

        void addAll(ReplicaMap other)
        Add all entries from the given replica map into the local replica map.

      • remove

        ReplicaInfo remove(String bpid,
                 Block block)
        Remove the replica's meta information from the map that matches the input block's id and generation stamp
        Parameters:
        bpid - block pool id
        block - block with its id as the key
        Returns:
        the removed replica's meta information
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the input block is null

      • remove

        ReplicaInfo remove(String bpid,
                 long blockId)
        Remove the replica's meta information from the map if present
        Parameters:
        bpid - block pool id
        blockId - block id of the replica to be removed
        Returns:
        the removed replica's meta information

      • size

        int size(String bpid)
        Get the size of the map for given block pool
        Parameters:
        bpid - block pool id
        Returns:
        the number of replicas in the map

      • replicas

        Collection<ReplicaInfo> replicas(String bpid)
        Get a collection of the replicas for given block pool This method is not synchronized. It needs to be synchronized externally using the mutex, both for getting the replicas values from the map and iterating over it. Mutex can be accessed using getMutext() method.
        Parameters:
        bpid - block pool id
        Returns:
        a collection of the replicas belonging to the block pool

        void initBlockPool(String bpid)

        void cleanUpBlockPool(String bpid)

      • getMutext

        Object getMutext()
        Give access to mutex used for synchronizing ReplicasMap
        Returns:
        object used as lock
